body_html: For now, I recommend cloning the git repository into another directory and running that version of the file. I think we'd have to rewrite our tutorials and examples to not assume relative path otherwise.
body_text: For now, I recommend cloning the git repository into another directory and running that version of the file.  I think we'd have to rewrite our tutorials and examples to not assume relative path otherwise.
body: For now, I recommend cloning the git repository into another directory and running that version of the file.  I think we'd have to rewrite our tutorials and examples to not assume relative path otherwise.
